metadata.title: CVE-2023-52887 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: can: j1939: enhanced error handling for tightly received RTS messagesin xtp_rx_rts_session_newThis patch enhances error handling in scenarios with RTS (Request toSend) messages arriving closely. It replaces the less informativeWARN_ON_ONCEbacktraces with a new error handling method. This provides clearer errormessages and allows for the early termination of problematic sessions.Previously, sessions were only released at the end of j1939_xtp_rx_rts().Potentially this could be reproduced with something like:testj1939 -r vcan0:0x80 &while true; do	# send first RTS	cansend vcan0 18EC8090#1014000303002301;	# send second RTS	cansend vcan0 18EC8090#1014000303002301;	# send abort	cansend vcan0 18EC8090#ff00000000002301;done

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52887` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-121-generic - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-5.15.0-121-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-121-generic - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-121-generic-64k - 5.15.0-121.131
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-kvm - 5.15.0-1066.71
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1069-aws - 5.15.0-1069.75
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1068-gcp - 5.15.0-1068.76
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-gke - 5.15.0-1066.72
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1052-gkeop - 5.15.0-1052.59
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1062-ibm - 5.15.0-1062.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1064.70
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-nvidia - 5.15.0-1064.65
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-nvidia-lowlatency - 5.15.0-1064.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1067-oracle - 5.15.0-1067.73
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1062-raspi - 5.15.0-1062.65
No subscription required
